item.title: Hello World
item.description: The first post has to be the ubiquitous Hello World. A bit of history “Hello, World” was created by Brian Kernighan, author of one of the most widely read programming books: C Programming Language, in 1978. He first referenced ‘Hello World’ in the C Programming Language book’s predecessor: A Tutorial Introduction to the Programming Language B published in 1973. main( ) { extrn a, b, c; putchar(a); putchar(b); putchar(c); putchar(’!
